title: Database Connection Timeout in Production
description: Multiple users reporting slow page loads and timeout errors. Database connection pool appears to be exhausted. Error logs show 'Connection timeout after 30 seconds' messages. Started approximately 2 hours ago during peak traffic hours.

title: Login API Returns 401 Unauthorized
description: Users unable to authenticate. Login API consistently returning 401 unauthorized errors even with valid credentials. JWT token validation appears to be failing. Auth service logs show 'Invalid signature' errors.

title: Payment Gateway Integration Failure
description: Payment transactions failing with 'Gateway unavailable' error. Third-party payment API returning 503 Service Unavailable. Approximately 150 failed transactions in the last hour. Users seeing error message at checkout.

title: Memory Leak in Order Processing Service
description: Order processing service experiencing increasing memory usage over time. Service crashes after 4-6 hours of operation. Heap dump analysis shows unreleased object references. Requires manual restart to resolve.

title: API Rate Limiting Not Working
description: Rate limiting configuration appears broken. Some clients exceeding allowed request limits without being throttled. Redis rate limit counter not incrementing properly. May lead to API abuse.

title: Email Notification Queue Backup
description: Email notification queue has over 50,000 pending messages. Message processing rate significantly slower than expected. RabbitMQ consumer lag increasing. Users not receiving transactional emails.

title: Dashboard Loading Extremely Slow
description: User dashboard taking 15-20 seconds to load. Network waterfall shows multiple slow API calls. Database queries not optimized. Frontend bundle size appears larger than expected at 3.5MB.

title: File Upload Failing for Large Files
description: Users unable to upload files larger than 10MB. Upload progress reaches 100% but then fails with 'Request Entity Too Large' error. Nginx configuration may need adjustment. Works fine in staging environment.

title: Kubernetes Pod Crash Loop
description: Inventory service pods constantly restarting. Pod crash loop detected with exit code 137 (OOMKilled). Memory limits may be too low. Service intermittently unavailable during restarts.

title: Search Functionality Returns No Results
description: Product search returning zero results for common queries. Elasticsearch cluster health status shows yellow. Index appears to be corrupted or out of sync. Last successful index rebuild was 3 days ago.

title: SSL Certificate Expiring Soon
description: Production SSL certificate set to expire in 5 days. Auto-renewal process failed last night. Certificate validation showing errors. Need to manually renew to avoid service disruption.

title: Broken Image Links in Product Catalog
description: Product images showing as broken links. CDN returning 404 errors for image URLs. S3 bucket policy may have changed. Affects approximately 30% of product listings.

title: Staging Environment Database Connection Issues
description: Cannot connect to staging database from application servers. Connection string appears correct but getting 'Connection refused' errors. Database server may be down or firewall rules changed.

title: Mobile App Crashes on Android 14
description: Mobile application crashing on startup for Android 14 devices. Crash logs show NullPointerException in initialization code. Works fine on Android 13 and below. Affects latest app version 3.2.1.

title: Webhook Delivery Failures
description: Outgoing webhooks failing to deliver to customer endpoints. Webhook retry queue growing rapidly. Timeout errors after 5 seconds. Some customer integrations breaking due to missed events.

title: Cache Invalidation Not Working
description: Redis cache not invalidating properly after data updates. Users seeing stale data for up to 10 minutes. Cache TTL settings appear correct. May be issue with cache key pattern matching.

title: GraphQL API Query Timeout
description: Complex GraphQL queries timing out after 30 seconds. Query depth appears too high causing N+1 database queries. DataLoader implementation may not be working correctly. Simple queries work fine.

title: Scheduled Reports Not Generating
description: Automated daily reports failing to generate since yesterday. Cron job appears to be running but no output files created. Job logs show 'Permission denied' errors when writing to S3.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Codes Not Arriving
description: Users not receiving 2FA SMS codes. SMS gateway API responding normally but messages not delivered. Carrier delivery reports showing delays of 5-10 minutes. Affecting user login experience.

title: Docker Container Image Pull Failures
description: Deployment pipeline failing at image pull step. Docker registry returning 'TLS handshake timeout' errors. May be network connectivity issue to container registry. Blocking new deployments.
